programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Step into the stylish world of the Suit & Uniform Styles Playlist! This collection features K-pop hits where artists rock sharp suits, dashing uniforms, and bold fashion choices that elevate their performances. From sleek suits to trendy uniforms, these iconic outfits add extra charm to each track. It’s the perfect mix of music, style, and swagger — a playlist that’s as fashionable as it is energetic!
